snippet: Shares of Dow Chemical and DuPont were up after reports that the companies were discussing a combination.
abstract: Stocks fall for third day, led by drop in technology shares.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Dow Chemical and DuPont were up after reports that the companies were discussing a combination.

headline.main: Tech Shares Slip as Market Extends Losing Streak
headline.print_headline: Equities Fall a Third Day, as Tech Shares Retreat
